body.raw:
## Editor
  • My editor of choice is [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) with a giant pile of [extensions](https://howivscode.com/dlarroder).
  • I am currently using [Andromeda](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=EliverLara.andromeda) as my theme.
  • [Fira Code](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode) is my font of choice, mainly because of the ligatures.
## Terminal
  • I use [Hyper](https://hyper.is/) when I'm on Ubuntu and Mac.
  • [Windows Terminal](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/windows-terminal/9n0dx20hk701) when I'm on Windows, it's running [WSL2](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install) with [oh-my-zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/) stock.
  • All terminals use [Fira Code](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode) as fonts because ligatures all the way.
## Desktop Apps
  • [Brave](https://brave.com/) is my main browser for both browsing and development.
  • [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) for API development and testing.
  • [Figma](https://www.figma.com/) mainly for inspecting designs.
  • [Slack](https://slack.com/) and [Teams](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.teams) for messaging or calls.
  • [Jira](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira) for issue tracking.
  • [Spotify](https://www.spotify.com/ph-en/) for music.
## Desk Setup
  • Laptop:
    • [Macbook Pro](https://www.apple.com/ph/shop/buy-mac/macbook-pro/16-inch) 16 inch M1 Pro
  • PC Specs:
    • Processor: Intel Core [i5 4670k](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/products/sku/75048/intel-core-i54670k-processor-6m-cache-up-to-3-80-ghz/specifications.html)
    • Motherboard: Asrock [Fatal1ty B85 Killer](https://www.eteknix.com/asrock-fatal1ty-b85-lga-1150-killer-motherboard-review/)
    • GPU: Zotac GeForce [GTX 960](https://www.zotac.com/us/product/graphics_card/gtx-960-4gb)
    • RAM: HyperX 8GB 1866mhz (2x)
    • CPU Cooler: [Freezer 34 eSports DUO](https://www.arctic.de/en/Freezer-34-eSports-DUO/ACFRE00075A)
  • Displays:
    • Primary Monitor - [Asus TUF Gaming VG27AQ](https://www.asus.com/Displays-Desktops/Monitors/TUF-Gaming/TUF-Gaming-VG27AQ/)
    • Secondary Monitor - [BenQ VZ2350](https://www.benq.com/en-ap/monitor/stylish/vz2350hm.html) (Vertically Mounted)
  • Sound:
    • Main headset for gaming: [Steelseries Arctis 7](https://steelseries.com/gaming-headsets/arctis-7)
    • Secondary headset for chillin: [Sony WH-1000XM4](https://www.sony.com.ph/electronics/headband-headphones/wh-1000xm4)
    • Main earbuds: [AirPods Pro](https://www.apple.com/ph/airpods-pro/)
## Keyboards
  • My main keyboard is a [GMMK Pro](https://www.pcgamingrace.com/products/glorious-gmmk-pro-75-barebone-black) (White Ice)
    • Switches: [Gazzew Boba U4t](https://zionstudios.ph/product/gazzew-boba-u4t-thocky-tactile-switches/) (Lubed with [Krytox 205g0](https://divinikey.com/products/205-grade-0-switch-lubricant) and Filmed with [Deskeys Film](https://divinikey.com/products/deskeys-switch-film))
    • Stabilizers: [Durock V2](https://divinikey.com/products/durock-v2-stabilizers-screw-in) (Lubed with [Permatex 22058](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000AL8VD2?tag=switchclick-20&geniuslink=true))
    • Keycaps: [Milkyway CMM BOW](https://zionstudios.ph/product/groupbuy-milkyway-cmm-bow/)
  • My secondary keyboard is a [Tecware Phantom Elite](https://www.tecware.co/phantomelite)
    • Switches: [Akko CS Lavender Purple](https://en.akkogear.com/product/akko-cs-lavender-purple-switch-45pcs/) (Lubed with Krytox 205g0)
    • Stabilizers: Stock stabs (Lubed with [Permatex 22058](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000AL8VD2?tag=switchclick-20&geniuslink=true))
    • Keycaps: [KBDfans DSA 9009](https://kbdfans.com/products/dsa-9009-keycaps-set?_pos=5&_sid=68694e57a&_ss=r)
